outputs.output_descr: This project promotes volunteerism to prepare and respond to disasters. It also has the capability of mobilizing over 2,500 highly trained volunteers to Latin America and other regions within 72 hours of a disaster.

project_descr: UNV collaboration with White Helmets (Argentina) on Disaster Risk Reduction- Prevention & Response to Emergencies and Disasters
project_title: Prevention & Response to Emergencies and Disasters
